alert.note: Alert for Bergen (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 11:04AM EDT until April 08 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in New Jersey... Saddle River near Lodi affecting Bergen County. For the Saddle River...including Lodi...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Major flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saddle River at Lodi. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Flooding at the Shop Rite parking lot along Memorial Drive. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 AM EDT Friday the stage was 8.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:45 AM EDT Friday was 9.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling to 2.8 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.1 feet on 03/07/2011. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (2 pm EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Saddle River Lodi 6.0 8.1 Fri 10 am ED 3.2 2.8 MSG &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 630 PM EDT.
